description: Subscribes an IAM Identity Center user or a group to a pricing tier for an Amazon Q Business application. Amazon Q Business offers two subscription tiers: Q_LITE and Q_BUSINESS. Subscription tier determines feature access for the user. For more information on subscriptions and pricing tiers, see Amazon Q Business pricing.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business application the subscription should be added to.

parameters.name: principal
parameters.description: The IAM Identity Center UserId or GroupId of a user or group in the IAM Identity Center instance connected to the Amazon Q Business application. user (string) --- The identifier of a user in the IAM Identity Center instance connected to the Amazon Q Business application. group (string) --- The identifier of a group in the IAM Identity Center instance connected to the Amazon Q Business application.

nested_params.name: user
nested_params.description: The identifier of a user in the IAM Identity Center instance connected to the Amazon Q Business application.

nested_params.name: group
nested_params.description: The identifier of a group in the IAM Identity Center instance connected to the Amazon Q Business application.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of Amazon Q Business subscription you want to create.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A token that you provide to identify the request to create a subscription for your Amazon Q Business application. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: subscriptionId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business subscription created.

nested_items.name: subscriptionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Q Business subscription created.

nested_items.name: currentSubscription
nested_items.description: The type of your current Amazon Q Business subscription.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of an Amazon Q Business subscription.

nested_items.name: nextSubscription
nested_items.description: The type of the Amazon Q Business subscription for the next month.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of an Amazon Q Business subscription.
